steps.text: This is a normal week of MTA ridership as measured by MetroCard swipes. You can notice here the normal cyclical trends of more commuters during weekdays and then dips in ridership each weekend.

steps.header: First COVID Case in New York
steps.text: March 1st was the day the first COVID-19 case was identified in New York State.
On March 20th, Governor Cuomo announces statewide stay-at-home order, known as the NYS on Pause Program,  beginning March 22nd.
Number of deaths peak for New York State at 1,055 in a single day. This data comes from the NYTimes compiled dataset.
